parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON Patch is a format for describing changes to a JSON document

schema.description: JSON Patch is a format for describing changes to a JSON document

post.summary: Retrieve a URI to download multiple files bundled as a zip [Read]

parameters.name: locationHint
parameters.description: Preferred location where the download will take place. Available locations: MDC, PDC, HDC, SFO and External.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Valid duration of the temporary authorization (in seconds), default value is 4hours

parameters.name: downloadName
parameters.description: Friendly name on saving the zip file

parameters.name: compressionLevel
parameters.description: Indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness

get.summary: Retrieves a paginated list of file metadata using OData [Read]

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Limit number of returned fields; e.g. name, metadata

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: OData like filter syntax; more details

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Sets the number of records to skip before it retrieves records in a collection (OData).

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Determines the maximum number of records to return (OData)

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Determines what values are used to order a collection of records (OData).

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Includes the X-Total-Count header in the response.

parameters.name: expandUrls
parameters.description: Expand urls property in return: GET - for download urls; PUT - for upload urls; null - by default, no expanding.

parameters.name: locationHint
parameters.description: (used with expandUrls) Preferred location of storage. Available locations: MDC, PDC, HDC, SFO and External.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: (used with expandUrls) Overrides the default expiry time(1 day). Unit:second

parameters.name: segmentSize
parameters.description: (used with expandUrls) The max size of each segment, it is 1073741824 (1GB) by default. It should be 5242880 (5MB) at least and less than 2147483648 (2GB). The total number of segments should be less than 1000. Set the segment size bigger for large file.

parameters.name: inline
parameters.description: (used with expandUrls) Determine inline display on browser

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: (used with expandUrls) Overrides the default file name

parameters.description: Expand urls property in return: GET - for download urls; PUT - for upload urls; null - by default, no expanding.

delete.summary: Deletes a file along with metadata and content [Write]

get.summary: Retrieves a temp auth Url of files by file Id for upload / download [Read]

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: UUID of file to upload/download, a new UUID should be created for uploading a new file

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The operation method: PUT for upload; GET for download

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Valid duration of the temporary authorization (in seconds), default value is 14400 (4hours)

parameters.name: locationHint
parameters.description: Preferred location of storage. Available locations: MDC, PDC, HDC, SFO and External.

parameters.name: fileSize
parameters.description:
The max size of single file, it would returns multiple urls of chuncks if the max size is
bigger than 1GB due to the limit of object storage. please input byte in this filed.

parameters.name: segmentSize
parameters.description:
The max size of each segment, it is 1073741824 (1GB) by default. It should be 5242880 (5MB) at least and 
less than 2147483648 (2GB). The total number of segments should be less than 1000. Set the segment size bigger for large file.

parameters.name: inline
parameters.description: True : Set Content-Disposition header as inline when downloading zip. False : Set Content-Disposition header as attachment.

parameters.name: inline

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
